original_body_lines: Salute of the motherland to the Sri Lankan gallant war heroes was held at the war memorial. Air Vice Marshal Ravi Arunthavanathan RWP, RSP, VSV, USP, M.Sc (Def. Studies), psc, SLAF (retd) had the honour to lay a floral tribute to commemorate them at this solemn ceremony. He was former Additional Secretary Defence and Deputy Chief of Staff of the Sri Lanka Air Force.
